An extension of [johno/digital-garden](https://github.com/johno/digital-garden) that adds the following:

- [x] Styling
- [ ] Gatsby Image support
- [ ] Full featured, filterable portfolio
- [ ] Site wide search

## Getting Started

- Try out the [demo](http://digitalgarden.westegg.xyz)
- Copy the starter from the [repo](http://repo.westegg.xyz/tree/master/starters/westegg-digital-garden)

  ```
  git clone git@github.com:adrwxyz/westegg.git
  cp -r westegg/starters/westegg-digital-garden new-site
  cd new-site
  npm install
  npm run-script build
  ```
